descriptions.ship: Find out how compatible two people are (Gabe's love calculator)

ship.user1: The first person to ship (defaults to you or the first mention)
ship.user2: The second person to ship (defaults to the mentioned user)

ship.fizzle: Uh oh... the sparks aren't flying yet. Maybe just friends?
ship.warm: There's a decent vibe here! A little spark never hurt anyone.
ship.glow: These two are glowing together—this could get serious!
ship.blaze: Now that's chemistry! Gabe ships it hard!
ship.destiny: Soulmate alert! Gabe is already planning the wedding.
